introFullstackPortfolio: Projects that combine creativity with robust functionality. I have extensive experience in both frontend and backend development, including database management, API integrations, server administration, and user-friendly design. Do you have an idea or a project in mind? Don't hesitate to contact me – I look forward to collaborating and creating something amazing together.

fullstackItems.title: Printagon Graphics
fullstackItems.subTitle: Fullstack
fullstackItems.description:
Development of a robust system to manage and track the workflow of two printing machines, focusing on job handling, monitoring paper usage, waste management, and managing remaining paper stock.

Key Contributions:
- Requirements Analysis & System Design: Conducted detailed requirements analysis and used Figma to visualize the system's interface and workflow, ensuring that both technical and business needs were considered before development.
- Backend Development: Led the development of the backend system using ASP.NET Web API, ensuring robustness, scalability, and performance.
- Database Management: Implemented SQL Server to efficiently handle complex relational data and manage large volumes of information, ensuring seamless data handling and access.
- Security: Developed a secure authentication system with different roles for administrator and user access.

Technologies Used:
- Backend: C#, ASP.NET Core
- Frontend: Material UI for responsive websites
- Design Tools: Figma for wireframes and interface design
- Database: SQL Server (SMSS)
- Version Control: Git
- Command Line Interface: CLI
- Development Tools: Visual Studio 2022

Challenges & Solutions:
- Designed a scalable system to handle high-volume data and operations.
- Ensured robust data integrity and efficient data management with SQL Server.
- Overcame challenges in backend authentication implementation, enriching my understanding of backend complexities.

Results:
- Improved workflow management and provided detailed insights into paper usage and waste, optimizing operational efficiency.
- Facilitated the management of paper stock.

fullstackItems.title: Prodigies
fullstackItems.subTitle: Fullstack
fullstackItems.titleDescription: An App for High School Students
fullstackItems.description:
Developing a mobile application to help high school students explore opportunities for post-secondary education, focusing on providing a seamless, cross-platform user experience.

Main Contributions:
- Frontend Development:
- Used React Native and TypeScript to create a responsive and intuitive interface.
- Ensured a consistent user experience across iOS and Android platforms.
- Backend Development:
- Managed APIs and data storage with Firebase, providing reliable backend services.
- Implemented SQLite for efficient handling of local data and offline functionality.
- Problem Solving:
- Overcame specific challenges in iOS development, ensuring robust cross-platform functionality.
- Adapted development strategies to maintain seamless performance and usability.

Technologies Used:
- Frontend: React Native, TypeScript
- Backend: Firebase, SQLite
- Version Control: Git
- Terminal: Command Line Interface (CLI)
- Development Tools: Visual Studio Code
- Methodology: Scrum

Challenges & Solutions:
- Solved complex iOS platform-specific issues, enhancing my problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
- Ensured the app's responsiveness and performance across different devices and screen sizes.

Outcomes:
- Delivered a valuable tool that helps students effectively navigate their educational choices.
- Gained extensive experience in mobile development and cross-platform integration.

fullstackItems.title: Kaffe Bönans Skafferi
fullstackItems.subTitle: Fullstack
fullstackItems.titleDescription: A coffee shop for coffee lovers
fullstackItems.description:
Embarked on a journey into full-stack development by creating an e-commerce platform tailored for coffee enthusiasts as part of my thesis project. Started with meticulous planning, I curated a tech stack that aligned with the intended functionalities, using SQL for user, cart, and product relations. By using both lo-fi and hi-fi prototypes in Figma, I refined the app's aesthetics, from color schemes to font choices.

Main Contributions:
- Frontend Development:
- Used React and TypeScript to orchestrate a seamless user experience.
- Enhanced aesthetics through careful design choices using Figma prototypes.
- Backend Development:
- Used ASP.NET Core to seamlessly integrate backend and frontend elements.
- Implemented robust backend authentication using the ASP.NET Core Authentication library.

Technologies Used:
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: C#, ASP.NET Core, SQL Server
- Database: SQLite
- Development Tools: Visual Studio Code
- Version Control: Git
- Deployment: Docker (Planned integration for streamlined deployment)

Challenges & Solutions:
- Overcame challenges in implementing backend authentication, enriching my understanding of backend complexities.
- Planned integration of PostgreSQL for improved database management and Docker for streamlined deployment on an Azure-based server.

Outcomes: Successfully navigated the journey from concept to realization within set deadlines, enriching my skills and understanding of full-stack development. Looking forward, I aim to integrate PostgreSQL for improved database management and Docker for streamlined deployment on an Azure-based server.
